title: My Life with Epilepsy
brief_description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Jodi tells of her family history with epilepsy and her personal journey as the condition began to affect her life.
